seo.title: Vernazza Maps 2025 | Village & Trail Navigation Guide
seo.description: Detailed maps of Vernazza. Village layout, hiking trails to other villages, viewpoints, and key landmarks for easy navigation.

body.title: Vernazza Maps & Navigation
body.subtitle: Navigate the compact village and surrounding trails. Detailed maps showing the harbor, castle, trails, and all major landmarks.

features.title: Village Layout
features.description: Main street, harbor piazza, and all key locations.

features.title: Hiking Trails
features.description: Routes to Monterosso, Corniglia, and mountain sanctuaries.

features.title: Landmarks
features.description: Doria Castle, churches, viewpoints, and photo spots.

features.title: Transportation
features.description: Train station, boat dock, and bus connections.

features.title: Dining & Shops
features.description: Restaurants, bars, gelaterias, and local stores.

features.title: Best Viewpoints
features.description: Top photo locations marked with optimal times.
